Job Title: Sr. Software developer  .Net, Angular Full stack
Job Description: What part will you play    You will be responsible for Implement and make sure standard methodologies   Participate in requirements analysis and meetings with business partners   Write clean, scalable code using C#, ASP.NET, Angular 8 , and Entity Framework 6 and Test and deploy applications and systems   Revise, update, refactor and debug code and Improve existing software   Develop documentation throughout the software development process (SDLC)   Assist other members of the team as needed     We don t need superheroes, just super minds     You must have BE / B. Tech / MCA / ME / M. Tech and a minimum of 4 years C# .NET development experience   Solid grasp of the following technologies and software: Visio, HTML, CSS (SCSS), Design Systems, Angular 8 , Razor, Jira, Git, SQL Server, Entity Framework, SSIS, SSRS   Build deploy, CI/CD pipeline automation, server configuration, Jenkins, Azure DevOps etc   An excellent teammate but can work independently too.   Excellent written and verbal communication skills.   Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.
